title: Brighter Days Ahead
overview: A short film accompanying the deluxe edition of "Eternal Sunshine," marking Ariana Grandeâ€™s directorial debut. Peaches, now elderly, revisits Brighter Days Inc. to relive idealized versions of her memories before they are destroyed forever. Inspired by the film "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind" and a sequel to the "We Can't Be Friends" music video.
